Petrosik.Utility

Class PseudoAStar

Namespace
Petrosik.Pathfinding
Assembly
PetrosikUtility.dll

Modified A* algorithm, faster in some cases but unstable and sometimes doesn't return any path. Good for open space not mazes

Cardinal directions only, no diagonals

Desn't support pathfinding for tile traversability

public class PseudoAStar : GridBase
